mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Suppliers(supplierid, adminno, sname, contactinfo, saddress, rdate) VALUES(supply_seq.nextval, 1, #{sname}, #{contactinfo}, #{saddress}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT supplierid, adminno, sname, contactinfo, saddress, rdate FROM Suppliers WHERE adminno = #{adminno} ORDER BY supplierid ASC
